North_Little_Rock.Hodge-Cook House: The Hodge-Cook House is a historic house at 620 North Maple Street in North Little Rock, Arkansas. It is a 1-1/2 story wood frame structure, with clapboard siding and a hip roof pierced by hip-roof dormers on each side. A gable-roof section projects from the right side of the front, with a three-part sash window and a half-round window in the gable.
